author: cwiklik
msg: UIMA-3919 re-enabled support for vm://localhost protocal which allows deployment with a colocated AMQ broker

author: baedke
msg: JCR-3761 : TokenInfo#resetExpiration always fails with ConstraintViolationException

author: jawi
msg: - introduced a HandlerMapping class that deals with the logic to determine which
servlets/filters need to be called for a given path;
- rewrote the ServletPipeline & FilterPipeline to make use of new HandlerMapping
class, which work again, but this code needs some additional TLC;
- added an itest for whiteboard registrations, which revealed a NPE in the init.
of servlets when given no initialization parameters;
- make sure to correctly quote stuff when converting patterns to regexs.
